fulltext: oai:www.clarin.si:11356/1046;2018-08-03T18:53:43Z;hdl_11356_1023;hdl_11356_1024;Gos corpus n-grams 1.0;Dobrovoljc, Kaja;n-grams;wordlist;multiword expressions;This is a collection of n-grams extracted from the Gos corpus of  spoken Slovene. http://hdl.handle.net/11356/1040. name: 9570b4a4-0159-50b9-9f5c-ee789df65c1f
notes: This is a collection of n-grams extracted from the Gos corpus of  spoken Slovene. http://hdl.handle.net/11356/1040. In addition to the separate lists of n-grams for tokens and their attributes (normalized form, morphosyntacic tag, lemma), an adjusted frequency list with statistical substring reduction has also been added (as described in O'Donnell 2011). Only n-grams within sentences have been counted.
title: Gos corpus n-grams 1.0
